segments.text: Mr . Black , I ' d like to take some time off . I ' Ve been feeling exhausted these days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's no problem . Let me see ... You still have ten days annual leave left , is that right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I was wondering if I could take another two weeks off .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's long leave . How's your project coming along ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The project I'm in charged of now will be done by the end of this week . I'd like to take my leave from next Monday on .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , all right . But you make sure to tie up loose ends before you leave .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , Mr.Black . There are no immediate projects coming up at the moment . Mr.Smith will be in charge during my absence . He is taking part in several projects as my assistant and knows how to maintain relationships with our clients .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great ! I hope you have a good relaxation and come back refreshed .
segments.speaker: S2
